mapper.insert: INSERT INTO challenge (chal_id, mem_id, regdate, deadline, chal_fr_id, chal_point) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(chal_id)+1,0) FROM challenge), #{item.memId}, #{item.regdate}, #{item.deadline}, #{item.chalfrId}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT c.chal_id, c.regdate, c.deadline, c.chal_point, f.title, f.des FROM challenge c JOIN challenge_frame f ON c.chal_fr_id = f.chal_fr_id WHERE mem_id = #{memId}
